title: 'Good quality and sharp'
body: 'Quality is good  sharp and 3 different size . But 1299 is fake mrp . Actual mrp is 60+50+40+ and I got all 3 for 67/-'

title: 'Good one'
body: 'Received the product in good condition. Seems to be value for money. Received in pristine condition.'

title: 'Overpriced product. Quality is okay'
body: 'If u are thinking that the scissors with such a mrp and discount is good then don’t go for it. The mrp for each scissors i receive was 405060 which totals to just 150. So buying at 200+ is not done. Don’t go for it.'

title: 'Cheap...'
body: 'The product I got is not as satisfactory as the product I buy by seeing the sellar pic'

title: 'V. Nice safety scissor'
body: 'It’s a safety scissor for 3 years and above kids... My kids totally enjoy cutting all by himself..'
